auth.signInPrompt: Sign in to access your dashboard

dashboard.title: Your personal AI dashboard

dataCollection.title: üì± Data Collection
dataCollection.description: This web dashboard is view-only for your data. To collect health data, location history, voice notes, and photos, please use the PersonalAI mobile app.
dataCollection.syncInfo: Once you've collected data on mobile, it will automatically sync and appear here for analysis and chat.

chat.title: Chat with AI
chat.description: Ask questions about your personal data

dashboard.noHealthData: No health data collected yet. Use the mobile app to sync health data from HealthKit or Google Fit.
dashboard.noLocationData: No location data collected yet. Enable location tracking in the mobile app to see where you've been.
dashboard.noVoiceNotes: No voice notes recorded yet. Use the mobile app to record and transcribe voice notes.
dashboard.noPhotos: No photos uploaded yet. Use the mobile app to capture and sync your photo memories.

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.subtitle: Ask questions about your personal data
chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your data...

emptyState.title: Start a conversation
emptyState.description: Ask me anything about your personal data. I'll use AI to find relevant information and give you accurate answers.
suggestions: How many times did I play badminton this year?
Where did I visit last month?
emptyState.note: üí° Note: I can only answer questions about data you've collected on the mobile app. If you haven't added any data yet, I won't have much to tell you!
